name: The Plot Hole: Little Red
description:
🛑 IF YOU HAVE ISSUE WITH THE DIALOGUE LOOPING, press "N" key to skip a dialogue !

🛑 IF A WORD IS NOT DELETED AFTER A WHILE, release and hold-click again on the word !

Ever wanted to get eaten by a wolf? Well, have we got a treat for you, because now you can! With the all-new, all narrative, all-button using , all-wolf-being-eaten-by, video game of the last century! Want more exclamation marks? We've got them! So check out The Plot Hole, the only game where you play as a little girl who definitely gets eaten by a wolf. Still want more? Can't have it! Or can you? Check out the innovative, never-before-seen second ending to the popular fairy tale. Can't find it? It's not there! Or is it? Yes, it is there! Roger Ebert gave this game two Ace of Spades and said, "You'll play this game ... maybe!" 

This is a narrative game with voice-acting, please enable audio !

Simple controls.:

Mouse Click to activate your plot hole and search for words that can be removed.

"A" and "D" for movement. 

Help, Tips & Know issues : 

  • You have to click on the black hole first, to then by able to invoke it by holding mouse click
  • The black hole can suck-up words that are wiggling only at its full size : hold click. If it takes too long release and click again
  • If you replaying the game or for some reason are stuck by a dialogue, you can skip it by pressing the "n" key
